name: Bad Sword No Good
description:
omg omg upload please PLEASE ONYL 15mins LEFT

[Z]  to attack   [X] to dash    [ARROWS] to move

your sword is cursed! it now hungers for human blood, kill humans to satisfy its hunger, but killing humans will make your virtue go down! so do the virtuous deed of killing skeletons to increase your virtue. if your sword gets too hungry or your virtue is too low then the game will crash! (didnt code death screen lol)
